title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 22nd, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 22nd, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Shawn Donnan previews this year’s G-20 summit and the faceoff between President Trump and President Xi-Jim Ellis details gay executives who talk about the importance of being out at work-Max Chafkin explains why bird brain experts are the new hot hire in Silicon Valley

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
